member_organisations:
The Coach Tourism & Transport Council of Ireland (CTTC) is the representative body for Ireland's coach touring companies, and Ireland's private bus operators. We promote Ireland's top independent coach hire operators. 
 
We are also members of EACT to lobby at European Level.
head_office_address: Suite 4 Unit 4, First Floor St. Fintan's
organisation_name: Coach Tourism and Transport Council of Ireland (CTTC)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The Coach Tourism & Transport Council of Ireland (CTTC) is the representative body for Ireland's coach touring companies, and Ireland's private bus operators. We promote Ireland's top independent coach hire operators. 
 
Our members are experts in all types of coach hire and transport solutions including: airport transfers, day tours, extended touring, incentive travel, golf tours, school transport, and scheduled services.
